alert.note: Alert for Crowley; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 7:00PM MDT until July 08 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Crowley County in southeastern Colorado... Northeastern Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 745 PM MDT. * At 700 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northeast of Pueblo Depot, or 25 miles northeast of Pueblo, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Crowley and northeastern Pueblo Counties. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
